td.content: s:32 yo white female complains of mild difficulty in school for 2 days. NKDA. o:Height 67 in, Weight 100 lbs, Temperature 98.5 F, Pulse 87, SystolicBP 115, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 18 a:Dyslexia p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed METHYLIN - 2.5 mg 2 x daily (max. 54 mg/day), and ordered Hearing Test.

s:white female wine steward aged 34 years presents with mild difficulty seeing similarities and differences in letters and words, mild difficulty in school x 10 days. pt also reports chronic mild difficulty with reading and writing. she states she has never smoked a cigarette in her life she consumes 2 drinks per night o:Height 67 in, Weight 98 lbs, Temperature 98.2 F, Pulse 76, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 16 a:Dyslexia p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed METHYLIN - 2.5 mg 2 x daily (max. 54 mg/day), and ordered Hearing Test.
